src:
Тихим ходом в микромир
05 Nov 2019, 14:53 by exsstas



Eating, Hatching, and Crashing into the Moon: More About TardigradesThis week, the microcosmos meet the cosmos as we explore even more fascinating things about our friend, the tardigrade. We'll discuss their weird weird mouths, …www.youtube.com
Недавно открыл для себя канал Journey to the Microcosmos — видеомикросъемка всевозможных маленьких животных, растений и прокариот и рассказы (на английском) о них спокойным голосом. Красиво, познавательно, успокаивающе. Очень рекомендуюСегодня вышел выпуск про суперзвезд микромира — тихоходок.
text:
Silently in the microworld
05 Nov 2019, 14:53 by exsstas



Eating, Hatching, and Crashing into the Moon: More About Tardigrades This week, the microcosmos meet the cosmos as we explore even more fascinating things about our friend, the tardigrade. We'll discuss their weird weird mouths, ... www.youtube.com
Recently I discovered the Journey to the Microcosmos channel - a video micro-recording of all kinds of small animals, plants and prokaryotes and stories (in English) about them in a calm voice. Beautiful, informative, soothing. I highly recommendToday there was a release about superstars of the microworld - tardigrades.
